channel.title: This site is as stupid as the MoparScapers:
channel.description:
[img]http://xs119.xs.to/xs119/07380/learnmath.JPG[/img] (that's on my profile)
All I have to say is, "Moparisthebest, teach your fucking server some fucking arithmetic."
P.S. Do I get my Java award now?

item.source: This site is as stupid as the MoparScapers:

item.title: This site is as stupid as the MoparScapers:
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:15, topic:145946”]Well, I have a theory based on all the shit mopar’s server goes through. Well, liek, sometimes a board on this site (mitb & mscp) like to randomly become 1.4 billion pages large full of nothing but the first few posts. This causes the board’s post and topic count to somewhat reset (and apparently our posts and topics in that section also reset.) However, it doesn’t appear to reset our overall post and topic counts, just the statistics side. So, basically there is nothing that can be done about it other than a forum re-count (if that will even work.)

PS: io9, I thought you “left” hehe[/quote]

Way off. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Integer_overflow. Basically io9 is posting more topics than can be enumerated in 32 bits. (And I <3 every one of them).

Read full topic

item.title: This site is as stupid as the MoparScapers:
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“planplan, post:16, topic:145946”][quote author=io9 link=topic=199850.msg1776964#msg1776964 date=1190602765]

(that’s on my profile)

All I have to say is, “Moparisthebest, teach your fucking server some fucking arithmetic.”

P.S. Do I get my Java award now?
[/quote]

How about learn C#, C++, Java, J#,BCEL,vC++ MFC.
and then just maybe you could get it?[/quote]
How 'bout get a fucking clue, it’s called the Java cup for a reason, not the, “C#, C++, Java, J#,BCEL,vC++ MFC. cup”. And of all those, I know C++ (which includes vC++ and WinAPI (aka MFC), Java (which includes BCEL/J#).

In conclusion, and without a moment to spare, “You fail, congratulations, now go kill yourself. Game-show-style empty smile”

Read full topic

item.source: This site is as stupid as the MoparScapers:

item.title: This site is as stupid as the MoparScapers:
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Well, I have a theory based on all the shit mopar’s server goes through. Well, liek, sometimes a board on this site (mitb & mscp) like to randomly become 1.4 billion pages large full of nothing but the first few posts. This causes the board’s post and topic count to somewhat reset (and apparently our posts and topics in that section also reset.) However, it doesn’t appear to reset our overall post and topic counts, just the statistics side. So, basically there is nothing that can be done about it other than a forum re-count (if that will even work.)

PS: io9, I thought you “left” hehe

Read full topic
